ygData.subject: Re: Level 8 Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: If I were buying only one, it would be Shock of Ice.  Bolts do have their place, and I regret waiting so long to buy some good ones, but they can miss or be
ygData.messageBody:
If I were buying only one, it would be Shock of Ice. Bolts do have their
place, and I regret waiting so long to buy some good ones, but they can miss
or be blocked and in my opinion that is just too risky. When you first get
the level new spells will use too much of your mana for you to want to risk
any failures. Save up for a bolt, it will be VERY useful at L10 or L11.

Calyn of Bristlebane


>Sorry, I know this has been discussed before, but I will soon be level 8
>and want to purchase just one new spell, saving up for level 12 spells.
>What is the best DD spell? Was planning on Fire Bolt, but would Shock of
>Ice be better?
>
